enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Asko Numminen said we have to implement more effective policies and called for negotiation of a protocol with concrete measures after 2000.
SRI LANKA: Reggie Ranatunga, Deputy Minister of Transport, the Environment and Women's Affairs, said Convention implementation is necessary at the local and regional levels.
ESTONIA: Prime Minister Andreas Tarand said that climate change in the Baltic States will cause increases in precipitation in the west and drought in the east, leading to increased migration.
Estonia is completing a long-term energy reduction plan.
